Desc.entry: Provides supported living and domiciliary care to people with learning disabilities in their own homes. Supported living accommodation - 3 properties: a 3-bedroomed bungalow (staffed 24hrs, 2 tenants and 1 sleep-in), a 2-bedroomed bungalow and 3-bedroomed semi (both staffed as support needed). Properties owned by Sheffield City Council and Places for People (see separate entry). Referral by Social Worker.

category.entry: LEARNING DISABILITIES - ORGANISATIONS FOR PEOPLE WITH
